_header: Ave gracia plena devoid of all trespass
_description: Hymn on the Angelic Salutation — seven stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd20059.First Lines:
Ave gracia plena devoide of all trespaceRyght well knowen to god
                    before the world begone…
BLAdd20059.Last Lines:
…One spyryte and will with cryst in his palaceWherefore haile
                    glorious lady mary full of grace
BLAdd20059.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript by Hunter in London,  British Library Addit. 24542, f.
                        178v.
BLAdd20059.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 103-5.
